page.title: 06AWRE, ALDERMASTON
page.content: The AWRE (Atomic Weapons Research Establishment) is the main employer in the area. Its work is classified, so obviously we cannot describe, even if we knew, what happens there. The majority of the local population have some form of contact with the AWRE, perhaps because of this we were unable to find any opposition to nuclear defence in the survey area, although some people expressed fears at living in such close proximity. This may surprise those who associate the area with CND marches and the "Greenham Women", but the supporters of these usually live far from this area. Obviously there must be some opponents locally, perhaps among the young, but they are far outnumbered by those who actively support nuclear defence or those to whom the AWRE and attendant industries mean employment.
